title: Luxury PG in Koramangala with AC
description: Fully furnished PG accommodation with all modern amenities. Located in the heart of Koramangala, close to all tech parks and restaurants. Spacious rooms with attached bathrooms and air conditioning. We provide 3 times meals, housekeeping, laundry, and high-speed internet.

title: Budget-Friendly PG in HSR Layout
description: Affordable PG accommodation in HSR Layout with basic amenities. Close to tech parks and public transport. Rooms are well-maintained with regular housekeeping. We provide 2 times meals and shared bathrooms. Ideal for students and working professionals.

title: Premium Co-living Space in Indiranagar
description: Modern co-living space with premium amenities. Located in the vibrant neighborhood of Indiranagar, walking distance from metro station. We offer fully furnished private rooms with attached bathrooms, a community kitchen, coworking space, and recreational areas. Perfect for young professionals.
